name: Super Hexagon (Game & Watch)
description:
Keyboard Controls:

Keyboard Buttons 1-4 can control the mode buttons, and arrow keys/a&d can control left/right. Press "Game A" or "Game B" to play! It starts off in "Time" mode.

Press:

  • "A game about alternate histories" - Forest Ambassador
  • You might have been okay at Super Hexagon, back in the day - Leigh Alexander; Boingboing.net
  • Welcome to the Past: Super Hexagon on the Game & Watch - Julian Benson; Kotaku
  • Weekly SVG - Sep 2, 2015 - Weekly SVG

Credits:

  • ...can be found within gameandwatch.js!

Special Thanks:
